alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kent; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:52PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Washington and south central Kent Counties through 230 PM EDT... At 152 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hopkinton, or 11 miles southeast of Jewett City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... South Kingstown, North Kingstown, East Greenwich, Hopkinton, Charlestown, Richmond, Exeter and West Greenwich. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. For your safety, go indoors or to your vehicle. This storm may intensify and become severe. Stay tuned to your local media for updates and possible warnings.
